name: Vyapin Software Systems Pvt. Ltd.,
tag_list: systems-management-software, systems-management-solutions, content-migration-tools, systems-audit-report, windows-auditing-tool, sharepoint-administration, active-directory-administrative-tools, iis-administration, exchange-server-administration
overview:
VYAPIN develops solutions for Systems, Security, Migration and Compliance management.

Their software products for the Microsoft infrastructure assist in Systems Administration, Configuration Tracking and Reporting, Systems Audit, Content Migration and Management.

Vyapin builds intelligent document migration solutions for Microsoft SharePoint. Vyapin is a pioneer in developing document migration solutions, starting from the very beginning when SharePoint was first introduced by Microsoft.

Their solutions for SharePoint first started with a migration tool for SharePoint Portal Server 2001 in April 2001 and since then we have built several robust solutions for SharePoint migration. We continue to build on this expertise to deliver world-class, business-centric applications for SharePoint technologies to date.

The most demanding and time-consuming tasks of managing a Windows network are Auditing & Reporting. A Windows network audit entails scanning the entire network of Servers and Workstations to first perform an inventory of the windows infrastructure, processing the resulting voluminous data and then generating the summary and detailed reports in a variety of formats.
